Dark_Blast.display_help: A long range blast of dark energy. Deals moderate Negative Energy damage and reduces the target's chance to hit. Damage: Moderate, Recharge: Fast
Dark_Blast.display_target_help: The Dark Blast has reduced your chance to hit.

messages.display_attacker_hit: You hit {PlayerDest} with your {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Negative Energy damage.
messages.display_victim_hit: {PlayerSource} hits you with their {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Negative Energy damage.

messages.display_attacker_hit: You hit {PlayerDest} with your {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Negative Energy damage.
messages.display_victim_hit: {PlayerSource} hits you with their {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Negative Energy damage.

Gloom.display_help: Gloom slowly drains a target of life, while reducing their chance to hit. Slower than Dark Blast, but deals more damage over time. Damage: High(DoT), Recharge: Moderate
Gloom.display_target_help: The Gloom is causing damage to you and reducing your chance to hit.

messages.display_attacker_hit: You hit {PlayerDest} with your {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Negative Energy damage over time.
messages.display_victim_hit: {PlayerSource} hits you with their {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Negative Energy damage over time.

messages.display_attacker_hit: You hit {PlayerDest} with your {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Negative Energy damage over time.
messages.display_victim_hit: {PlayerSource} hits you with their {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Negative Energy damage over time.

Umbral_Torrent.display_help: You summon a wave of mire that sweeps away foes within its arc. This attack deals moderate Negative Energy damage to foes, reduces their chance to hit and sends them flying. Damage: Minor, Recharge: Slow
Umbral_Torrent.display_short_help: Ranged (Cone), Moderate DMG(Smashing), Foe -To Hit, Knockback
Umbral_Torrent.display_target_help: The Torrent has reduced your chance to hit.

messages.display_attacker_hit: You hit {PlayerDest} with your {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Negative Energy damage.
messages.display_victim_hit: {PlayerSource} hits you with their {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Negative Energy damage.

messages.display_attacker_hit: You knock {PlayerDest} off their feet with your {PowerName}!
messages.display_victim_hit: {PlayerSource} knocks you off your feet with their {PowerName}!

messages.display_victim_hit: {PlayerSource} knocks you off your feet with their {PowerName}!

Aim.display_help: Greatly increases the chance to hit of your attacks for a few seconds. Slightly increases damage. Recharge: Long
Aim.display_attacker_hit: You activate {PowerName} and increase the power of your next few attacks.

messages.display_attacker_hit: You tap into your inner core with your {PowerName} and are more accurate and more deadly for a short while.

Moonbeam.display_help: An extremely long range and accurate beam of Negative Energy that deals tremendous damage and reduces the target's chance to hit. This is a sniper attack, and like most sniper attacks, is best fired from a distance as it can be interrupted. If you are engaged in battle this attack becomes instant-cast. If you are not engaged, it will do bonus damage. Damage: Extreme, Recharge: Slow
Moonbeam.display_short_help: Sniper, Extreme DMG(Negative), Target -To Hit, Self +Range
Moonbeam.display_target_help: The Moonbeam has reduced your chance to hit.

Tenebrous_Tentacles.display_help: You can create a cone shaped rift to the Netherworld that allows its native creatures to slip their oily Tentacles into our reality. These creatures will snare all foes within range, Immobilizing them while the Tentacles drain their life and reduce their chance to hit. Damage: Moderate(DoT)Recharge: Slow
Tenebrous_Tentacles.display_short_help: Ranged (Cone), Moderate DMG(Negative/Smash), Foe Immobilize, -To Hit
Tenebrous_Tentacles.display_target_help: The Tenebrous Tentacles are holding you immobile and reducing your chance to hit.

Abyssal_Gaze.display_help: You gaze into your foe's eyes giving them a glimpse into the terrifying netherworld rendering them held, reducing their chance to hit and dealing High Negative Energy damage over the next couple of seconds. Damage: High Recharge: Slow
Abyssal_Gaze.display_short_help: Ranged, High DoT(Negative), Foe Hold, -To Hit
Abyssal_Gaze.display_target_help: The Petrifying Gaze has stopped you in your tracks!

Life_Drain.display_help: You can tap the power of the Netherworld to steal some life from a target foe and reduce their chance to hit. Some of that stolen life is transferred to you in the form of Hit Points. Damage: High, Recharge: Moderate
Life_Drain.display_short_help: Ranged, High DMG(Negative), Target -To Hit, Self +HP
Life_Drain.display_target_help: Your chance to hit has been reduced by the Life Drain.

Blackstar.display_help: You can unleash a devastating blast of Negative Energy around yourself, dealing massive Negative Energy and Smashing damage and severely reducing affected foes' chance to hit. Damage: Extreme, Recharge: Very Long
Blackstar.display_target_help: Your chance to hit has been reduced by the Blackstar.
